mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_RECOMMENDATION_RANKING SET REG_PF_ID = #{userRankingRegId}, PRTNR_BPLC_CD = #{partnerBusinessCode}, TRIP_LCTGRY_CD = #{tripLctgryCode}, destination_Type = #{destinationType}, destination_content_id = #{destinationCId}, DN_DETAIL = #{destinationDetail}, TOP_RANK = #{userRank}, REV_STATS_STRT_YMD = #{reviewStatsStart}, REV_STATS_END_YMD = #{reviewStatsEnd}, PF_PSTG_STRT_YMD = #{platformAdStart}, PF_PSTG_END_YMD = #{platformAdEnd}, ACT_YN = #{activate} WHERE MBR_ARTCL_RANK = #{userRankingId};
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MBR_ARTCL_RANK) AS userRankingNum, MBR_ARTCL_RANK AS userRankingId, REG_PF_ID AS userRankingRegId, PRTNR_BPLC_CD AS partnerBusinessCode, TRIP_LCTGRY_CD AS tripLctgryCode, destination_Type AS destinationType, m.destination_content_id AS destinationCId, m.DN_DETAIL AS destinationDetail, t.destination_title AS destinationTitle, t.destination_first_address AS destinationAddr, t.destination_first_image_link AS destinationImg, TOP_RANK AS userRank, REV_STATS_STRT_YMD AS reviewStatsStart, REV_STATS_END_YMD AS reviewStatsEnd, PF_PSTG_STRT_YMD AS platformAdStart, PF_PSTG_END_YMD AS platformAdEnd, ACT_YN AS activate FROM MEMBER_RECOMMENDATION_RANKING AS m INNER JOIN TOUR_INFO_FROM_API AS t ON m.destination_content_id = t.destination_content_id WHERE m.MBR_ARTCL_RANK = #{userRankingNum};
